pageContext.claim: “Hey, speaking of protesters, have you seen what’s happened in Iran? The protesters are on our side. First time ever. They're on our side. In fact, they put this big American flag on the street. And the Iranians, thousands and thousands of Iranians were supposed to walk on it and trample it and step and beat the hell out of it. Every one of them went around that flag. They like Trump … That’s called progress.”
pageContext.analysis: Certain parts of the Iranian public have long supported the United States and the West. It's not a new phenomenon under Trump.
